channel.title: FXCore by Experimental Noise
channel.description:
It's nowhere near an Axoloti in terms of convenience, but it might be cheaper if you're embedding a large number of them into instruments? Anyway, it's much better than the FV-1! I list all the upgrades and do a sound demo of chorus, auto-wah, delay, and reverb.
https://youtu.be/DYhs6E68QNg

item.title: FXCore by Experimental Noise
item.dc:creator: @DIYDSP DIY DSP
